none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 22, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
 My long distance love for Canada just keeps getting deeper. More passionate. Prince Edward Island's ABRAXAS borrow members from previous subjects of adoration like ANTIBODIES, WARSH and WROTH and only need two songs to make me fall head over heels. One textbook raw DBeat ripper and one hyper charged pogo slammer that opens with the sickest fucking riff ever. Like, the best riff. Play louder. Love harder. Break more stuff. Canada. ABRAXASSeriously, there are only like 150K people on this damn island...how do they fukkn do it?!
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OZ-HeQKewV8/X2ofgO-LQoI/AAAAAAAAYDc/aVVafe5qpNAIz3VBWHh_IWKR34HFdeXUgCLcBGAsYHQ/s807/Abraxas.jpg https://www.google.com/search?q=prince+edward+island&sxsrf=ALeKk01COeEclehQbALhYKL8KVbtBN5LAA:1600790827496&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj0oofFkv3rAhUJip4KHb9oC-sQ_AUoAXoECB0QAw&biw=1553&bih=1145

seo.title: ABRAXAS - Terminal Escape
